title: ScoreMyChores
cardDescription: A way to manage household responsibilities. Assign tasks, track progress, and motivate everyone with a point-based reward system.
detailsDescription:
ScoreMyChores is a planned mobile-first application designed to gamify household responsibilities by awarding points to users for completing chores and ranking them on a shared leaderboard. The goal is to make everyday tasks more engaging, fair, and transparent when living with others.

The idea for this project came from my own experience after moving back from Hungary to England and sharing a home with two other people, where keeping track of chores and contributions quickly became a real-world problem worth solving.

This project will also serve as my first step into mobile application development. I‚Äôm intentionally approaching it as a learning-focused project, with an emphasis on understanding mobile-first design, state management, and user interaction patterns while building something genuinely useful.
